contents:
Atlas NFT is a project dedicated to generative art and photography. It’s main focus at the moment is The Atlas of Fleeting Moments. There will be serveral drops. Stay tuned for updates.
Use the links below to follow this project also on other channels:
 Twitter OpenSea
title: About Atlas NFT

contents:
This drop consists of a single 1/1 NFT captured at the 2020 World Exposition held in Dubai from October 2021 to March 2022.
This moment was captured at the central hub of the exposition, under the 65-meter-high dome of Al Wasl Plaza.
Name: Expo 2020, Al Wasl Plaza. Original Image Unique Attributes - temperature: 26 - noise: 65 - altitude: 33 - timestamp: 1639120441000 - latitude: 24.9613978 - longitude: 55.1509770 Details - author: 0x3507b169f5c1ae40da76ceb114f1b223ae35f637 - contract: 0x2953399124F0cBB46d2CbACD8A89cF0599974963 - token_id: 23986173370145536322699012959698545426864722380502947683855894898760761737217 â†’ buy this NFT!
title: Expo 2020

title: Provenance

contents:
The Atlas of Fleeting Moments is a collection of unique collectible moments in the form of 1/1 NFTs on the Polygon blockchain.
Reality is ephemeral, the very fabric of what is eludes true perception and escapes trough our own fingers. The theatre staging the unfolding of this poignant story we called time.
What we are left with is the opportunity to capture fleeting snapshots of our reality like fragile worlds inside tiny glass globes.
title: The Atlas of Fleeting Moments
